definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 20:9 deed, work;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ge 44:15 +, cstr. [[מַעֲשֵׂה]] Is 5:12 +; sf. [[מַעֲשֵׂהוּ]] Ju Jdg 13:12 +, etc.; pl. [[מַעֲשִׂים]] Ge 20:9 +; cstr. [[מַעֲשֵׂי]] Je 1:16 +; sf. [[מַעֲשָׂיו]] 1Sa 19:4 (or sg., so Dr) +, etc.;—oft. acc. cogn. c. [[עשׂה]];—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: (1) deed, thing done by man Nu 16:28 (JE), 1Ki 13:11, Is 26:12; —1Sa 20:19 is obscure; (2) implic. evil Ge 44:15 (J), Ex 23:24 (E), Ne 6:14 + 8 t., + sg. coll. doing(s) Mic 6:16, Le 18:3, Le 18:3 (H), 2Ch 17:4, [[יְדֵיהֶם]] ´[[מ]] La 3:64, Hag 2:14, Job 33:17 (rdg. [[מִמַּעֲשֵׂהוּ]] LXX Di Siegf Bu), Ez Eze 16:30 (behaviour); explic. [[מַעֲשֵׂינוּ הָרָעִים]] Ezr 9:13 cf. Ec 4:3, Ec 8:11, Ec 8:14, [[מַעֲשֵׂי־אָוֶן]] Is 59:6; specif. of idolatr. practices, [[יְדֵיכֶם]] ´[[מ]] sg. De 31:29, Je 25:6, Je 25:7, Je 32:30, pl. Je 44:8, cf. sg. 1Ki 16:7, 2Ki 22:17 = 2Ch 34:25; (3) implic. right, praiseworthy 1Sa 19:4, 2Ki 23:19, Jon 3:10, Pr 31:31; of duty in gen. [[אֲשֶׁר יַעֲשׂוּן]] ´[[הַמּ]] Ex 18:20 (E) = what they are to do; explic. Ec 4:4, Ec 8:14; (4) as basis of judgment (good or bad) Is 66:18, Ps 33:15, Ps 62:13, Ec 12:14, [[יְדֵיהֶם]] ´[[מ]] Je 25:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: (1) work, labour, husbandry Ex 23:16 (E), Ge 5:29 (J), Ju Jdg 19:16, [[יְדֵיכֶם]] ´[[מ]] Hag 2:17; enforced labour of Isr. in Egypt Ex 5:5, Ex 5:13 (J); in gen. Ex 23:12 (E); also of product of labour Ex 23:16, cf. Is 65:22, Ec 5:5; ´[[שֵׁשֶׁת יְמֵי הַמּ]] Ez Eze 46:1 the six working-days; of religious work, ´[[עֲבׂדַת בֵּית הָא]] ´[[מ]] 1Ch 23:28, cf. ´[[מ]] 2Ch 31:21 (2) business, pursuit, Ge 46:33, Ge 47:3 (J), Ju Jdg 13:12, 1Sa 25:2, Is 54:16; in gen., occupation Is 29:15, Ec 2:4, Ec 2:11, Ec 3:17, Ec 3:22, Ec 8:9, Ec 9:7, Ec 9:10; (3) undertaking, enterprise Is 19:14, Is 19:15, De 15:10; [[יׇדְֶָ]] ´[[מ]] De 2:7 + 5 t. Dt, 2Ch 32:30, Job 1:10, Ps 28:4, [[יׇדֵינוּ]] ´[[מ]] Ps 90:17, Ps 90:17. (4) achievement Je 48:7, Es 10:2; (5) in weakened sense, [[מַעֲשֶׂיְ]] Pr 16:3 thine affairs; nearly = occurrences Ec 1:14 (pl.), Ec 2:17, Ec 8:17 (sg.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: deed(s), work(s) of ´[[י]], esp. in deliverance and in judgment, Ju Jdg 2:7, Jdg 2:10, Jos 24:31 (D), Ps 33:4 + 21 t., + [[יׇדָיו]] ´[[מ]] etc. Is 5:12, Ps 28:5, Ps 92:5 + 4 t.; [[הָאֱלֽהִים]] ´[[מ]] in gen. Ec 7:13, Ec 8:17, Ec 11:5 cf. Ec 3:11.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: (1) work, thing made, by man, [[אׂפֶה]] ´[[מ]] Ge 40:17 (E) baker's work; [[יְדֵי יוֹחֵר]] ´[[מ]] La 4:2; oft. of furnishings of tabern., [[חשֵׁב]] ´[[מ]] Ex 26:1 + 7 t., [[רׂקֵם]] ´[[מ]] Ex 26:36 + 5 t., [[אׂרֵג]] ´[[מ]] Ex 28:32 + 2 t., [[חָרָשׁ]] ´[[מ]] Ex 28:11, cf. [[יְדֵי אָמָּן]] ´[[מ]] Ct So 7:2; of holy oil, etc, [[רׂקֵחַ]] ´[[מ]] Ex 30:25 + 2 t. (ins. [[רׂקֵחַ]] perh. also 2Ch 16:14); hence ´[[מ]] = work of art Is 3:24 (of coiffure), cf. ´[[כְּלִי מ]] Nu 31:51; sq. n. of material, pattern, etc., [[עִזִּים]] ´[[מ]] v:Nu 31:20 (i.e. goats’ hair), v. also Ex 27:4, Ex 28:14 +; in temple, [[שְׂבָכָה]] ´[[מ]] 1Ki 7:17, ´[[מ]] [[שׁוּשַׁן]] v:1Ki 7:19, etc.; [[חַעֲחֻעִים]] ´[[מ]] 2Ch 3:10, cf. [[הַחֲבִתִּים]] ´[[מ]] 1Ch 9:31 the work of (consisting in) bread-wafers; = materials of (prepared for) [[הָעוֹלָה]] 2Ch 4:6; in theoph. [[לִבְנַת הַסַּפִּיר]] ´[[מ]] Ex 24:10 (J); ´[[מ]] of ships 2Ch 20:37; in gen. Is 29:16; Ez Eze 27:16, Eze 27:18 = thy manufactures, wares; [[מַעֲשַׂי]] Ps 45:2 = my verses (poi/hma, poem); (2) workmanship Ez Eze 1:16, Eze 1:16 (v:Eze 1:16 a del. Co Toy) 1Ki 7:8, Ex 28:8 + 11 t.; (3) [[יְדֵי אָדָם]] ´[[מ]] of idols (contemptuously) De 4:28, 2Ki 19:18 = Is 37:19 = 2Ch 32:19, Ps 115:4, Ps 135:15, cf. Is 2:8 ([[יׇדָיו]] ´[[מ]]), Ho 14:4, Mic 5:12, Je 1:16; so ([[יְדֵי]]) ´[[מ]] [[חָרָשׁ]] De 27:15, Je 10:3, Je 10:9 cf. Ho 13:2; [[חֲכָמִים]] ´[[מ]] Je 10:9; [[תַּעְתֻּעִים]] ´[[מ]] v:Je 10:15, Je 51:18; appar. also [[מַעֲשֵׂהֶם]] Is 41:29 cf. Is 57:12, Ez Eze 6:6; [[יׇדָיו]] ´[[מ]] of altars Is 17:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: work (made by) God Ex 32:16 (E); esp. (poet. and late), of created things, Ps 103:22, Ps 104:24 + 4 t. Psalm; [[אֶחְבְּעׂתֶיְ]] ´[[מ]] Ps 8:4, [[יׇרֶיְ]] ´[[מ]] Ps 102:26 (both of heavens), cf. Ps 19:2 (heavenly bodies), Ps 8:7 (animals); of man Job 14:15, Job 34:19, cf. [[לָדַעַת כָּל־אַנְשֵׁי מַעֲשֵׂהוּ]] Job 37:7 (but rd. prob. [[אנשׁים]] Vulgate Ol Di al.); of nation Is 19:25, Is 60:21, Is 64:7; of weights Pr 16:11 (but rd. perh. [[הַמֶּלֶךְ]]) for ´[[י]] Gr Toy).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: product of olive-tree, [[זַיִת]] ´[[מ]] Hb Hab 3:17; fig. product of righteousness Is 32:17.
